title: [Gameplay] - Aether Wing Kayle Dance Glitch
body:
Aether wing kayle legendary skin.

Issue 'dance' command.

Watch sword glitch in the ground.

Happens every time.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on!
You are the absolute best. And even though I am Order aligned......I'd support team Khaos for all that you do.

Pulling this one up from the boards grave.

Sorry for the delay in this - should be fixed next patch. :]
Oh my!!! It's been a while since I logged into the boards. Sorry for the grave-digging notification, but I just wanted to say thank you Katey!!! <3
You're welcome! Thanks for taking the time to report the issue!
